texts.load-error-generic: Failed to load data from server.
texts.upload-error-filename: The document has been rejected because its name contains illegal characters. Rename the file using only alphanumeric characters, spaces and no other special characters except -_.
texts.info-validation-success: Validation completed successfully. The data is correct.
texts.warning-validation-failed: Some required fields have not been entered or have an invalid value. Cannot continue.
texts.warning-validation-pdf: It is necessary to generate the summary PDF, and upload the signed version.
texts.survey-bidBaseValueNoDiscount-total: of which not subject to discount:
texts.survey-bidValue-preview-note: Only visible at the Contracting Authority:
texts.error-bidDiscount: The discount value must be between 0 and 100.
texts.error-bidValue-min: The value is less than the minimum allowed:
texts.error-bidValue-max: The value is greater than the maximum allowed:
texts.pdf-reset-warning-message: The summary PDF file has been deleted due to a value change. You need to re-generate the PDF and upload the signed version.
texts.mdgue-part1:
Use the M-DGUE service integrated in the platform to compile the electronic ESPD and once the "XML Response" file has been produced, return here to upload it.
To compile a new ESPD retrieving the data entered in the platform (master data of the company or of the group leader in case of RTI, lots, etc.).
texts.mdgue-part2: For any further ESPDs required to other parties (members of the group, auxiliary companies, subcontractors...) use or share
texts.mdgue-part3: To modify or reuse an existing "XML Response", or to perform other operations
texts.dgue-request-error: Impossible to continue due to missing DGUE Request in the tender documents. Contact the contracting authority to correct the data
